price: Na hakika laana yangu itakuwa juu yako mpaka Siku ya Malipo.
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَتِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ
footnotes: Na hakika wewe umetengwa mbali na kila kheri mpaka Siku ya Malipo. Hapo utalipwa kwa sababu ya kunikufuru Mimi na kunifanyia kiburi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnatī ilā yawmi al-dīni
